title: Ever since patch 6.20 i hvent been able to get pass the lol launcher client. "unspecific error"
body: Since the 6.20 patch the client has been getting a "update failed unspecific error" and i don't know what to do about this, I've tried many things including doing a reinstall. Will someone please help me with this issue?

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more information!  The issue can vary depending on where you are receiving the unspecific error.  At what percent of the patcher are you getting this?  Let me know!
Thank you for responding, but the problem has been fixed. It turns out my anti virus software was preventing my client from updating.
